TRANSMISSION ASSEMBLY (TRANSMISSION REMOVED), Replace

Includes:
1. Remove and replace component and reinstall all related parts
2. Transfer yoke, clutch housing/cross shaft , speedo components, fittings, ect. as required
3. Road test

Excludes:
1. TRANSMISSION (MANUAL), REMOVE & REINSTALL
2. TRANSMISSION (AUTOMATIC), REMOVE & REINSTALL

Notes:
1. For Allison automatic transmissions, refer to manufacturer for replacement allowances

1. Disassemble, clean, inspect, replace failed components and reassembly
2. Drain/Refill oil
3. R&R yoke, clutch housing/cross shaft, slave valve, shift cover assembly, input and output shaft/bearing/seal as required
4. Press work to remove/install gears and bearings as required
5. Steam clean
6. Road test

Excludes:
1. TRANSMISSION (MANUAL), REMOVE & REINSTALL

TRANSMISSION REAR SECTION (TRANSMISSION IN CHASSIS), Repair

Includes:
1. Disassemble, clean, inspect, replace failed components and reassembly
2. Steam clean
3. R&R Driveshaft
4. R&R yoke, rear mainshaft bearing/shaft/seal, rear section and auxiliary drive gear
5. Press work to remove/install gears and bearings as required
6. Road test

Notes:
1. This operation may not be used when replacing another component requiring transmission removal. Refer instead to the (Transmission Removed) operation
2. Refer to Rear Section Synchronizer / Shift Fork, Replace when replacing only those components.
